item.title: 拥挤的美国贸易为外资流入印度带来希望
item.description: (彭博社）— 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：(Bloomberg) — Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 尹炳世被弹劾后，韩国执政党党魁辞职
item.description: 韩国总统尹锡烈上周末因颁布简短的戒严令而遭到弹劾，在要求他辞职的呼声日益高涨之后，韩国执政党领导人表示他将下台。【原文：The leader of South Korea’s ruling party said he’s stepping down following mounting calls for his resignation, after President Yoon Suk Yeol was impeached over the weekend for his brief martial-law decree.】

item.title: 加拿大住房部长辞去特鲁多内阁职务
item.description: 加拿大住房部长肖恩-弗雷泽（Sean Fraser）将辞去内阁职务，并且不打算参加下届大选，此举正值贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）领导的自由党民调不佳，2025 年大选迫在眉睫之际。【原文：Canadian Housing Minister Sean Fraser is resigning from cabinet and doesn’t plan to run in the next election, a move that comes as Justin Trudeau’s Liberal Party languishes in the polls with an election looming in 2025.】

item.title: 卢拉说巴西唯一的问题是高利率
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）周日晚间在接受电视采访时表示，巴西的利率过高，财政问题日益严重的责任在于中央银行的决策者。【原文：Brazil’s interest rates are too high, and responsibility for the growing fiscal problems lies with policymakers at the central bank, President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said Sunday night in a TV interview.】

item.title: 刺激效应减弱，中国消费意外放缓
item.description: 中国 11 月份的零售额增长意外减弱，凸显出中国政府进一步鼓励居民消费的紧迫性。【原文：China’s retail sales growth unexpectedly weakened in November, highlighting the urgency for Beijing to further encourage residents to spend.】

item.title: 中国经济复苏 "脆弱"，房价降幅放缓
item.description: 11 月份，中国房价降幅连续第三个月放缓，表明随着政策制定者加大力度结束房地产市场的低迷，房价开始趋于稳定。【原文：China’s home-price declines eased for a third month in November, suggesting values are beginning to stabilize as policymakers step up efforts to end the property slump.】

item.title: Grab 股票本季度的大涨让一些分析师看到了进一步上涨的希望
item.description: 一些分析师认为，Grab Holdings Ltd. 的股价在本季度迄今为止大涨 35% 之后，还会有更多的涨幅。【原文：There are more gains to come in Grab Holdings Ltd.’s stock after a 35% surge so far this quarter, according to some analysts.】

item.title: 尹炳世加入越来越多被清洗下台的韩国总统名单
item.description: 尹锡烈总统的下台可能既迅速又令人震惊，但他只是韩国越来越多上台后命运发生转变的领导人中的最新一位。【原文：President Yoon Suk Yeol’s demise may have been swift and shocking, but he is just the latest in a growing list of South Korean leaders who’ve seen their fortunes turn after rising to power.】

item.title: 520 亿美元的差距表明对安巴尼帝国的看法两极分化
item.description: 信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）今年在印度股票市场上表现不佳，导致分析师对该公司股票的预期与当前股价之间出现四年多来最大的差距。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd.’s underperformance to India’s equity market this year is driving the widest gap between analysts’ expectations for the stock and its current share price in more than four years.】

item.title: 美国降息预期升温，黄金维持两日跌势
item.description: 在美联储做出今年最后一次利率决定之前，黄金连续两天下跌，交易商也在权衡2025年的政策前景。【原文：Gold held a two-day drop ahead of the Federal Reserve’s final interest-rate decision of the year, with traders also weighing the policy outlook for 2025.】

item.title: 伦敦房主赶在印花税上调前出售房屋
item.description: 据Rightmove称，由于卖家试图在即将到来的增税之前抢占先机，伦敦的小户型住宅正大量涌入市场，这有可能抑制明年大部分时间的房产需求。【原文：Small homes in London are pouring onto the market as sellers try to get ahead of an upcoming tax increase, threatening to dampen demand for property for much of next year, according to Rightmove.】

item.title: 汇丰银行称贸易协议前景看好英印企业发展
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的数据显示，今年以来，英国和印度之间的业务蓬勃发展，因为两国的企业都预计两国政府将能够达成一项自由贸易协定。【原文：Business between the UK and India has boomed this year as firms in both countries anticipate their governments will be able to seal a free trade agreement, HSBC Holdings Plc data showed.】

item.title: 随着科维德时代债务到期，亚洲新兴市场债券销售将激增
item.description: 亚洲新兴国家政府明年的债券发行量将增加 68%，因为它们将为科维德时期的债务再融资，这将削弱投资者的潜在回报。【原文：Emerging Asian governments are set to boost bond issuance by as much as 68% next year as they refinance Covid-era debt, sapping potential returns for investors.】

item.title: 澳大利亚任命弗莱-麦基宾和贝克为澳大利亚央行利率制定委员会成员
item.description: 澳大利亚任命参与央行审查的 Renée Fry-McKibbin 和本迪戈和阿德莱德银行前首席执行官 Marnie Baker 为储备银行新的货币政策委员会成员。【原文：Australia appointed Renée Fry-McKibbin, who participated in the review of the central bank, and former Bendigo and Adelaide Bank CEO Marnie Baker to the Reserve Bank’s new monetary policy committee.】

item.title: 比特币创下 2021 年以来最长的周赢利记录
item.description: 比特币攀升至历史新高，延续了当选总统唐纳德-特朗普对数字资产的支持及其将美国打造成该行业主导力量的计划所引发的涨势。【原文：Bitcoin climbed to a record high, extending a rally sparked by President-elect Donald Trump’s support for digital assets and his plan to turn the US into the dominant force in the sector.】

item.title: 美国发出加强制裁俄罗斯的信号后，石油保持每周涨势
item.description: 由于美国表示要加强对俄罗斯原油的制裁，而中国当局也誓言要支撑国家经济，石油价格在一周上涨后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after a weekly gain as the US signaled tighter sanctions on Russian crude and Chinese authorities vowed to shore up the nation’s economy.】

item.title: 日本央行将考虑加息，但行动紧迫性不高
item.description: 日本央行将在本周的政策会议上讨论加息路径，官员们认为，尽管下一次提高借贷成本的时间越来越近，但采取行动的紧迫性有限。【原文：The Bank of Japan is set to discuss its rate hike path at this week’s policy meeting, with officials holding the view that there is limited urgency to act even though the next increase in borrowing costs is coming closer.】

item.title: 私人银行增加香港招聘以争取中国富豪客户
item.description: 财富管理公司正在香港加大招聘力度，以应对中国大陆资金的流入。【原文：Wealth managers are ramping up hiring in Hong Kong to cater to an inflow of mainland Chinese money.】

item.title: 中国数据公布前亚洲股市将下跌：市场综述
item.description: 在中国公布一系列数据以及中国监管机构誓言稳定市场之前，亚洲股市周一将下跌。韩国总统尹锡烈被弹劾后，韩国资产将受到密切关注。【原文：Asian stocks are set to fall on Monday ahead of a swath of Chinese data and a vow from the nation’s regulators to stabilize markets. South Korean assets will be closely watched after President Yoon Suk Yeol was impeached.】

item.title: 德国在欧洲最需要的时候崩溃了
item.description:
高昂的能源成本和出口下滑使德国家庭的收入减少了2500欧元，而且这种下降趋势有可能变得不可逆转。【原文：

High energy costs and slumping exports have made German households €2,500 poorer and the decline threatens to become irreversible.

】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp. ）对美国一家标志性钢铁制造商的巨额收购出价岌岌可危，美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）提出了在未来几天内取消该交易的理由。美国一个主要枢纽的原油库存正在下降。严重的牛荒正在伤害美国的牛肉产业。【原文：Nippon Steel Corp.’s blockbuster takeover bid for an iconic American steelmaker is in jeopardy, with President Joe Biden armed with reasons to kill the deal in the coming days. Crude oil stockpiles at a major US hub are sinking. And a severe cattle shortage is hurting the US beef industry.】

item.title: 汇丰银行因银行诈骗损失失误被澳大利亚监管机构起诉
item.description: 澳大利亚市场监管部门起诉汇丰银行（HSBC Bank of Australia Ltd.），称其未能保护在骗局中损失数百万美元的客户。【原文：Australia’s markets watchdog sued HSBC Bank of Australia Ltd. for failing to protect customers who lost millions of dollars in scams.】

item.title: 比特币和啤酒，先去自动取款机
item.description:
一种灵活的筹资工具正在流行。此外，Asics 首席财务官讨论了外汇、关税和股东问题。【原文：

A flexible tool for fundraising is in vogue. Plus, Asics’ CFO discusses foreign exchange, tariffs and shareholders. 

】

item.title: 弹劾投票后韩元和股市成为焦点
item.description: 韩国货币和股市将在周一成为焦点，因为投资者将对周末投票弹劾总统尹锡烈试图实施戒严令一事做出回应。【原文：South Korea’s currency and its stock market will take center stage on Monday, as investors respond to a weekend vote to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol following his attempt to impose martial law.】

item.title: 西非各国政府有六个月时间重新考虑退出贸易集团的问题
item.description: 西非领导人给予马里、尼日尔和布基纳法索的军事领导人更多的时间重新考虑从地区经济集团中分裂出去的问题，这是避免该集团分裂的最后尝试。【原文：West African leaders gave military leaders from Mali, Niger and Burkina Faso more time to reconsider their split from the regional economic bloc in a final attempt to avoid its fracture.】

item.title: 希腊总理称希腊将对银行汇款手续费设置上限
item.description: 希腊总理基里亚科斯-米佐塔基斯（Kyriakos Mitsotakis）周日表示，希腊将对银行收取的汇款费用设定上限，同时人们在支付账单时不会被收取任何费用。【原文：Greece will impose a cap on fees that banks charge for money transfers while people won’t be charged with any fees when they pay their bills, Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis said on Sunday.】

item.title: 特朗普推动的美元升势明年年底将面临现实检验
item.description: 由于美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的政策和美联储的降息措施可能会在 2025 年下半年给美元带来压力，华尔街开始对美元感到不满。【原文：Wall Street is starting to sour on the dollar as President-elect Donald Trump’s policies and the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate cuts will likely put pressure on the greenback in the latter portion of 2025.】

item.title: 巴鲁将与勒庞会面，组建法国政府的努力由此开始
item.description: 法国总理弗朗索瓦-巴伊鲁（Francois Bayrou）将于周一会见极右翼领导人玛丽娜-勒庞（Marine Le Pen），为组建政府以推动预算案通过分裂的议会拉开序幕。【原文：France’s Prime Minister Francois Bayrou will meet with far-right leader Marine Le Pen on Monday, kicking off an effort to form a government that can push a budget through a divided Parliament.】

item.title: 伊朗全力应对冬季寒流带来的燃料短缺问题
item.description: 寒流迫使伊朗大部分地区的学校停课，公共生活也受到其他干扰，因为当局正在努力解决供暖和发电用天然气短缺的问题。【原文：A cold snap has forced school closures and other disruptions to public life across much of Iran, as authorities grapple with a shortage of natural gas for heating and electricity generation.】

item.title: 如果工作岗位得以保留，意大利梅洛尼公司准备与 Stellantis 公司合作
item.description: 意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）表示，在 Stellantis NV 汽车制造商寻求新的发展道路时，只要能将工作岗位和工厂留在意大利，意大利政府愿意与该公司合作。【原文：The Italian government is willing to work with Stellantis NV as the carmaker charts a new course as long as it keeps jobs and factories in the country, Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni said.】
